com.binghamton.jhelp.util

Class ColorStringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.binghamton.jhelp.util.ColorStringBuilder

  • public class ColorStringBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class composing a `StringBuilder` with the additional API of basic terminal formatting and coloring via terminal codes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ColorStringBuilder.Color
      An enum enumerating available colors
      static class  ColorStringBuilder.Format
      An enum enumerating available formats

      • append

        public void append(java.lang.String string,
                   ColorStringBuilder.Color foregroundColor,
                   ColorStringBuilder.Color backgroundColor)
        Appends colored text to the builder
        Parameters:
        string - the String to format and append
        foregroundColor - the color to make the foreground of the String. Ignored if null.
        backgroundColor - the color to make the background of the String. Ignored if null.

      • append

        public void append(java.lang.String string,
                   ColorStringBuilder.Color foregroundColor,
                   ColorStringBuilder.Color backgroundColor,
                   ColorStringBuilder.Format format)
        Appends colored and/or formatted text to the builder
        Parameters:
        string - the String to format and append
        foregroundColor - the color to make the foreground of the String. Ignored if null.
        backgroundColor - the color to make the background of the String. Ignored if null.
        format - the format to format the String with. Ignored if null.
